name: Alone in the Snow
description:
You are a hunter who is looking for your companion - a fox. Unfortunately, there is only one real path you must take. All other paths to the goal are fake. Can you do this? Maybe everything you see is not what it seems at first glance? Check it out

Asset Used:

  • https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/characters/animals/toon-fox-183005
  • https://www.mixamo.com/#/?page=1&type=Character
